title: YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4 Waterproof Nylon with Zipper for Men & Women, Black
descriptions:
YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags, Set of 4 – Waterproof Nylon with Center Zipper, Black

Keep your footwear and essentials protected and organized wherever you go. The YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags are crafted from lightweight, waterproof nylon and designed for men and women who value clean packing, easy storage, and versatile use.

What’s included
- 4 bags total: 2 Standard + 2 X-Large
- Standard (2 pcs): Fits shoes up to size 10
- X-Large (2 pcs): Fits sizes 10–14

Key features
- Waterproof, lightweight nylon: Shields shoes and gear from moisture, dust, and dirt without adding bulk.
- Versatile use: Ideal for travel, gym trips, and closet storage; doubles as a makeup or toiletries bag.
- High-quality construction: Durable, custom-made center zipper glides smoothly and stands up to frequent use.
- Organized packing: Separate clean clothes from shoes or keep pairs together to prevent scuffs and odors.
- Unisex, minimalist design: Sleek black color looks clean and professional in any suitcase or closet.

Why you’ll love it
- Protects and contains: Perfect for sneakers, dress shoes, heels, sandals, and more.
- Multi-purpose value: One set covers travel packing, daily gym runs, and at-home organization.
- Reliable durability: Built to last, with reinforced stitching and premium zipper hardware.

Warranty
- Lifetime warranty covering quality issues for peace of mind.

Specifications
- Material: Nylon
- Color: Black
- Waterproof: Yes
- Zipper: Custom-made, high quality, center-zip design
- Set size: 4 bags (2 Standard, 2 X-Large)

Care tips
- Wipe clean with a damp cloth; air dry.
- Store flat when not in use to save space.

Pack smarter and travel cleaner with the YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags—your go-to solution for organized, protected footwear and essentials.
